name: Eldritch Inc. and the colors from outer space
name_original: Eldritch Inc. and the colors from outer space
description:
Latest version (v1.0) can be downloaded here ===> DOWNLOAD v1

Pitch: watch on Youtube

A meteorite crashes into earth, local villagers who lived nearby became violent mutants. It is up to paranormal investigators: Jhonny Eldritch & Mary Hunter to figure out what is going on and stop the infestation.

This game was made for the 2021 Game Jam+ in 48 hours.

Topic/category: "Colores y pintura"

Team: 

Felipe Porcel - 3D environments, level design, narrative design and story
Juan Carlos Porcel - programming and character animation
Manuel Soruco - Music and SFX
Leonardo Mallea - Concept art, key art, animation, character design
Marco Zeballos - programming
